擻字的基本解释

擻
sòu

擻
sǒu
均见“擞”。

擻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sǒu］
［《廣韻》蘇后切，上厚，心。］
“擞1”的繁体字。
(1)见“抖擻”。
(2)颤抖貌。参见“擻抖抖”。
[②]［sòu］
“擞2”的繁体字。
(1)通。
(2)特指用通条插到火炉里，把灰抖掉。

擻字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　擻； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页461第20
【唐韻】【集韻】?蘇后切，音叟。抖擻，舉也。【王維詩】抖擻辭貧里。【釋氏要覽】梵語杜多，華言抖擻。亦作斗藪。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [sǒu]
["Guangyun" Su after the cut, thick, heart. ]
Traditional characters for "擞1".
(1) See "Shaking".
(2) Shaking appearance. See "Shake and Shake".
[②]［sòu］
Traditional characters for "擞2".
(1) Pass.
(2) In particular, it refers to inserting a cleaning rod into the stove to shake off the ashes.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　擞; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 461 No. 20
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Su Houqie, sound old man. Shaking, lift also. [Wang Weishi] Shaking away from poverty. 【Su Shi's Guide】Sanskrit Dudo, Chinese language is vigorous. Also used as a fight.
